fields.label: Module ID
fields.description: The unique internal ID for this module. This can only be changed in the source code.

fields.label: Display title
fields.description: The name by which this module will be presented to the user (e.g., on the home screen).

fields.label: Disabled
fields.description: If selected, the module cannot be used by any user

fields.label: Protected
fields.description: Require that users authenticate before being able to access this module.

fields.label: SSL
fields.description: Require that this module only be accessed using an SSL connection. Note: Maintaining a proper SSL site is the responsibility of the site administrator.

fields.label: Include in federated search
fields.description: Include this module's content in the site-wide federated search accessible from the home screen.

fields.label: Help text
fields.description: Optional. If this field is empty, the Help button/link will not be shown for this module.
